ingredients.ingredient: 1 (4 ounce) can sliced jalapeno peppers, with liquid

cookingTips: Soak peanuts overnight before boiling for faster cooking
Boil for 4-6 hours until peanuts reach desired tenderness
enrichment.coachingPrompt: How can I tell when the peanuts are cooked to the right texture? Should they be soft or have some bite?
